page.title: 11HEALTH SERVICES _ DUNDONALD
page.content: Dundonald area is served by a modern health centre _ known locally as "The Clinic" _ where a variety of services is offered to local people. At the Clinic there are three doctors and a trainee doctor to look after ordinary health problems. During the day a Health Visitor is always on duty to give advice to people. The District Nurse also has her headquarters in the Clinic and she goes out to bed_ridden patients and gives general nursing care in the community. She also looks after the old people. Another of her duties is to offer advice on Family Planning. She holds a special clinic for this. Pensioners and others can also go to the Clinic for Chiropody treatment from a visiting Chiropodidst who has a modern and well equipped surgery in the Health Centre.
